div.h4: In this type of task you have to build figures with blocks
div.h5:
• Click on the pencil at the bottom left to insert blocks. Every time you have used one of the other functions, for example chosen a new color, you have to click on the pencil again to build.
• Draw multiple blocks at a time by clicking and pressing down, while moving the mouse.
• Click on the eraser, if you want to delete a block. Click on the block that you would like to delete.
• Click on the color palette to choose which color you would like to build with.
• With the color palette, you can also change colors on a block that you have already built. Just choose a color and click on the block you would like to change colors on.
• Click on the crossed arrows to move the camera to the left or right or up and down.
• Click on the ring with the two arrows to turn the camera. You can also move the camera, if you click and hold down on the white background around the building surface. Move with your mouse or trackpad to turn the camera.
• Click on the trash can if you would like to delete everything you have built. Then you can start over.
• Zoom in or out by rolling the scroll wheel of your mouse or your trackpad, while is in the building room.
